name: {DD} Crossed legs
description:
This Lora helps with crossed legs.

I want to create an ultimate crossed legs lora, that will help in every pose including legs up and lying on belly. For now it can work with from behind and from front tags.

Weights somewhere between 0.7-1.

Works with other Lora, but you need to figure out the weights according to exact Lora you are using. Sometimes 0.75-0.75 is ok, sometimes one should be stronger that another.

Clip skip 2 for anime models.

Trained on 512x512, so for the basic image use resoultion with 512 from at least one side (512x768 for example).

Tags:

Crossed legs, standing

*DDC_behind, DDC_front (for more realistic versions, STRONGLY affects the style)

v2

Now it can be used freely with "from front" or "from bellow".

Enjoy)

Feel free to ask any questions here in comments, or in my discord channel.

Also I am making games with AI arts. They will be free in the future, but if you want to participate in making or have an early access - you can support me on patreon)
